Name: Plan
effectDescription: Plan your project, increasing Design speed 5% per level

Name: Design
effectDescription: Design your project, boosting Implementation by 10% per level

Name: Implement
effectDescription: Implement your project, increases Promotion Progress by 6% per level

Name: Revise
effectDescription: Revise your project, increases Implementation and Design speed by 4% per level

Name: Submit
effectDescription: Submit your project, difficulty and time are based on project size
